name: Starry Legend
description:
Starry Legend: Once you pop, you can't stop!
Starry Legend can make many surprise prizes for you; The more coins you get in games, the more reward you could have. It's THAT SIMPLE and THAT AWESOME!
Starry Legend is a game where you must select a color group of stars on a grid and click to destroy them.
Tap on two or more adjacent stars to destroy them.
The more stars you destroy with a single click, the higher your score will be.
Starry Legend involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast paced action.
Starry Legend features:
- Auto Save game level
-involves more deep thinking and strategy instead of fast paced action.
- There is no time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage
- Try to clear all blocks, you will get a lot of bonus!
- Starry Legend is a good choice to kill time and training brain.
- You can get bonus when you reach the new level.
- Try your best luck to play Lucky Spin every day, collect free coins and prizes.
